meanings.sent1: The flaxiest fabric was soft and smooth.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was made of the flaxiest material available.
meanings.sent3: The flaxiest shirt made him feel like he was floating on a cloud.
meanings.sent4: The flaxiest sheets felt like sleeping on a bed of feathers.
meanings.sent5: The flaxiest pillowcase was a delight to rest his head on.

meanings.definition: resembling flax in color or texture
meanings.sent1: The flaxiest yarn had a light, golden hue.
meanings.sent2: The painting captured the flaxiest shades of blue and green.
meanings.sent3: Her hair, the flaxiest of all, shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The flaxiest clouds in the sky looked like cotton candy.
meanings.sent5: The flaxiest fields swayed gently in the breeze.

meanings.definition: having the highest proportion of flax fibers
meanings.sent1: The flaxiest paper was strong and durable.
meanings.sent2: The flaxiest rope could withstand heavy loads.
meanings.sent3: The flaxiest basket held all the fruits without breaking.
meanings.sent4: Her dress, made of the flaxiest material, never tore.
meanings.sent5: The flaxiest twine was perfect for crafting.
